class api.models.Game(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

Maps to Riot API game DTO.

Instead of summonerId and championId, foreign keys to those objects are used. RawStat object is related to by these objects via 1-to-1. Player objects point to this to allow reverse-querying of match participants.

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception Game.MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

api.tests module¶

api.urls module¶

api.utils module¶

api.utils.chunks(l, n)[source]¶

Yield successive n-sized chunks from l.

l must be a list.

api.utils.get_recent_matches(summoner_id, region='na')[source]¶

Retrieves game data for last 10 games played by a summoner, given a summoner ID and region.

api.utils.get_summoner_by_id(summoner_ids, region='na')[source]¶

Get one or more summoner info objects by ID from Riot API and insert them into DB.

Max summoners per request is 40 (MAX_ID).

api.utils.get_summoner_by_name(summoner_name, region)[source]¶

Get summoner info, by name from Riot API, into cache.

Returns a Summoner object.

api.utils.reset_recent()[source]¶

Clear all DB objects related to recent match history.

Debugging function.

api.utils.summoner_name_to_id(summoner_name, region='na')[source]¶

Convert summoner name to summoner ID via DB lookup, otherwise query from Riot API.

api.utils.update_champions()[source]¶

Update the DB table containing champion info from Riot API.

api.utils.update_items()[source]¶

Update the DB table containing item info from Riot API.

api.utils.update_static_data()[source]¶

Update the DB with all static data from Riot API.

api.utils.update_summoner_spells()[source]¶

Update the DB table containing summoner spell info from Riot API.

Module contents¶

Backend module for lol_stats.

Queries the Riot API as well as interacting with the lol_stats DB.
